page.title: 03FARMING IN GEISE AREA
page.content: APART FROM GEISELITTLE FARM NEAR THE A882 THE OTHER FARMS IN THE AREA ARE OWNED BY ONE FAMILY. THE FARMING IS MAINLY CATTLE FARMING WITH CROPS GROWN FOR FEEDING. THE MOST ARABLE LAND IS AT BUCKIES AND GEISELITTLE. THE AREA IS GENERALLY POOR FARMING LAND AND THE LAND IS MOSTLY ROUGH GRAZING. ALL THE FARMERS HAVE COMMENTED ON THE EXCEPTIONALLY BAD WEATHER THIS SUMMER WHICH WAS THE WETTEST SUMMER RECORDED AND EXPRESSED CONCERN ABOUT THE RESULTING VERY BAD HARVEST. CROPS HAVE ROTTED IN THE FIELDS AND THIS WILL RESULT IN LACK OF FODDER FOR THE CATTLE OVER THE WINTER.
